Module java.prefs

module java.prefs
Defines the Preferences API.
Since:
9

  • Packages

    Exports
    Package
    Description
    java.util.prefs
    This package allows applications to store and retrieve user and system preference and configuration data.

  • Services

    Uses
    Type
    Description
    PreferencesFactory
    A factory object that generates Preferences objects.
